featured.text: However, CGI has difficulties of its own, and there will always be a demand for the realism and thrilling 30 of an actual stunt.
Today, CGI (computer generated imagery) is widely used in filmmaking, and it is now 29 to create very lifelike scenes without using real stunt people.

definition.zh_def: 通用網關介面，一種用於網頁伺服器與外部程序之間的標準協議。
definition.en_def: Common Gateway Interface, a standard protocol for web servers to communicate with external programs.
definition.example: The website uses CGI scripts to process form submissions.
